richTextBody.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Blankets for T.O. hosted two events for October 2020!","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We started off the Fall semester by organizing an open giveaway for a $20 Amazon gift card and Blankets for T.O. membership. ","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"In the spirit of Halloween, we hosted a pumpkin carving competition open to all UTSC students! It was also a good time to destress from midterm exams, since students were able to socialize and have a good time while competing to carve the best jack-o'-lantern they could. The pumpkins carved were awesome! Thanks to all those who participated! ","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","content":[],"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"4gdgK5u7XQ0cD2DivvUMgy","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}

childMarkdownRemark.html: In October, Blankets for T.O. hosted a pumpkin carving contest for UTSC students and giveaway.
